itemLabel: David Hunt, Baron Hunt of Wirral

wikipedia_page.main: David James Fletcher Hunt, Baron Hunt of Wirral,  (born 21 May 1942) is a British Conservative politician who served as a member of the Cabinet under the Thatcher and Major administrations, and was appointed to the Privy Council in 1990.

response: *1942 – David Hunt, Baron Hunt of Wirral, English politician, Secretary of State for Wales
